title: IDSPBRMaterial.Metallic
description: Gets or sets the metallic-ness of this material.
remarks:
For more information about this property:
Open https://dassaultsystemes-technology.github.io/EnterprisePBRShadingModel/spec-2025x.md.html in an internet browser, click CTRL-F and type "Metallic" in the pop up. Click
Next result
repeatedly.
Search for "Metallic vs metal" on the web.
